00125 extern time_t ServerBootTime ;
00126 
00143 int nfs4_op_setclientid(  struct nfs_argop4 * op ,    
00144                           compound_data_t   * data,
00145                           struct nfs_resop4 * resp)
00146 {
00147   char funcname[] = "nfs4_op_setclientid" ;
00148   char str_verifier[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00149   char str_client[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00150 
00151 #define arg_SETCLIENTID4  op->nfs_argop4_u.opsetclientid
00152 #define res_SETCLIENTID4  resp->nfs_resop4_u.opsetclientid
00153 
00154   clientid4             clientid ;
00155   nfs_client_id_t       nfs_clientid ; 
00156   nfs_worker_data_t   * pworker = NULL ;
00157   unsigned int          i = 0 ;
00158 
00159   pworker = (nfs_worker_data_t *)data->pclient->pworker ;
00160 
00161   strncpy( str_verifier, arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.verifier, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00162   strncpy( str_client, arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.id.id_val, arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.id.id_len )  ;
00163   str_client[arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.id.id_len] = '\0' ;
00164 
00165   DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID Client id len = %u", arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.id.id_len ) ;
00166   DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID Client name = #%s#", str_client ) ;
00167   DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID Verifier = #%s#", str_verifier ) ;
00168   DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID Callback: cb_program = %u|0x%x, cb_location = { r_addr = %s   r_netid = %s }",
00169                    arg_SETCLIENTID4.callback.cb_program, arg_SETCLIENTID4.callback.cb_program,
00170                    arg_SETCLIENTID4.callback.cb_location.r_addr, 
00171                    arg_SETCLIENTID4.callback.cb_location.r_netid ) ;
00172 
00173   DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID callback_ident : %u", arg_SETCLIENTID4.callback_ident ) ;
00174 
00175   /* First build the clientid4 nickname */
00176 
00177   /* There was no pb, returns the clientid */
00178   resp->resop = NFS4_OP_SETCLIENTID ;
00179   res_SETCLIENTID4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00180 
00181   /* Compute the client id */  
00182 #ifdef _Linux_x86_64
00183   if( nfs_client_id_compute( str_client, &clientid ) != CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS ) 
00184 #else
00185   if( nfs_client_id_sha1_compute( str_client, &clientid ) != CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS )  
00186 #endif
00187     {
00188         res_SETCLIENTID4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00189         return res_SETCLIENTID4.status  ;
00190     }
00191   DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID computed clientid4=%llx for name='%s'", clientid, str_client ) ;
00192 
00193   /* Does this id already exists ? */
00194   if( nfs_client_id_get( clientid, &nfs_clientid ) == CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS )
00195     {
00196         /* Client id already in use */
00197         DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID ClientId %llx already in use for client '%s', check if same", clientid, nfs_clientid.client_name ) ;
00198 
00199         /* Principals are the same, check content of the setclientid request */
00200         if( nfs_clientid.confirmed == CONFIRMED_CLIENT_ID )
00201           {
00202 #ifdef _NFSV4_COMPARE_CRED_IN_SETCLIENTID
00203                 /* Check if client id has same credentials */
00204                 if( nfs_compare_clientcred(  &(nfs_clientid.credential), &(data->credential ) ) == FALSE )
00205                   {
00206                     DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID Confirmed ClientId %llx -> '%s': Credential do not match... Return NFS4ERR_CLID_INUSE",
00207                                      clientid, nfs_clientid.client_name ) ;
00208 
00209                     res_SETCLIENTID4.status = NFS4ERR_CLID_INUSE ;
00210                     res_SETCLIENTID4.SETCLIENTID4res_u.client_using.r_netid = nfs_clientid.client_r_netid ;
00211                     res_SETCLIENTID4.SETCLIENTID4res_u.client_using.r_addr = nfs_clientid.client_r_addr ;
00212 
00213                     return res_SETCLIENTID4.status ;
00214                   }
00215                  else
00216                   DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID ClientId %llx is set again by same principal", clientid ) ;
00217 #endif
00218 
00219                 /* Ask for a different client with the same client id... returns an error if different client*/
00220                 DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID Confirmed ClientId %llx already in use for client '%s'", clientid, nfs_clientid.client_name ) ;
00221                 
00222                 if( strncmp( nfs_clientid.incoming_verifier, arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.verifier, NFS4_VERIFIER_SIZE ) )
00223                   {
00224                        DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID Confirmed ClientId %llx already in use for client '%s', verifier do not match...", 
00225                                         clientid, nfs_clientid.client_name ) ;
00226 
00227                        /* A client has rebooted and rebuilds its state */
00228                        DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "Probably something to be done here: a client has rebooted and try recovering its state. Update the record for this client" ) ;
00229 
00230                        /* Update the record, but set it as REBOOTED */
00231                        strncpy(  nfs_clientid.client_name,  arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.id.id_val, arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.id.id_len) ;
00232                        nfs_clientid.client_name[arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.id.id_len] = '\0' ;
00233                        strncpy( nfs_clientid.client_r_addr, arg_SETCLIENTID4.callback.cb_location.r_addr, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00234                        strncpy( nfs_clientid.client_r_netid, arg_SETCLIENTID4.callback.cb_location.r_netid, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00235                        strncpy( nfs_clientid.incoming_verifier, arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.verifier, NFS4_VERIFIER_SIZE ) ;
00236                        snprintf( nfs_clientid.verifier, NFS4_VERIFIER_SIZE, "%u", (unsigned int)ServerBootTime ) ;
00237                        nfs_clientid.confirmed  = REBOOTED_CLIENT_ID ;
00238                        nfs_clientid.cb_program = arg_SETCLIENTID4.callback.cb_program ;
00239                        nfs_clientid.clientid   = clientid ;
00240                        nfs_clientid.last_renew = 0 ;
00241 
00242                        if( nfs_client_id_set( clientid, nfs_clientid, pworker->clientid_pool ) != CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS )
00243                         {
00244                                 res_SETCLIENTID4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00245                                 return res_SETCLIENTID4.status  ;
00246                         }
00247 
00248                   }
00249                 else
00250                   {
00251                     DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID Confirmed ClientId %llx already in use for client '%s', verifier matches. Now check callback", 
00252                                      clientid, nfs_clientid.client_name ) ;
00253 
00254                     if( nfs_clientid.cb_program == arg_SETCLIENTID4.callback.cb_program )
00255                       {
00256                          DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID with same arguments for aleady confirmed client '%s'", nfs_clientid.client_name ) ;
00257                          DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID will set the client UNCONFIRMED and returns NFS4_OK", nfs_clientid.client_name ) ;
00258 
00259                         /* Set the client UNCONFIRMED */
00260                         nfs_clientid.confirmed  = UNCONFIRMED_CLIENT_ID ;
00261 
00262                         res_SETCLIENTID4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00263 
00264                         /* Update the stateid hash */                         
00265                         if( nfs_client_id_set( clientid, nfs_clientid, pworker->clientid_pool ) != CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS )
00266                         {
00267                                 res_SETCLIENTID4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00268                                 return res_SETCLIENTID4.status  ;
00269                         }
00270 
00271                       }
00272                     else
00273                       {
00274                          DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID Confirmed ClientId %llx already in use for client '%s', verifier matches. Different callback program 0x%x != 0x%x",
00275                                           clientid, nfs_clientid.client_name, nfs_clientid.cb_program, arg_SETCLIENTID4.callback.cb_program ) ;
00276                       }
00277                   }
00278           }
00279         else
00280           DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID ClientId %llx already in use for client '%s', but unconfirmed", clientid, nfs_clientid.client_name ) ;
00281     }
00282   else
00283     {
00284        /* Build the client record */
00285        strncpy(  nfs_clientid.client_name,  arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.id.id_val, arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.id.id_len) ;
00286        nfs_clientid.client_name[arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.id.id_len] = '\0' ;
00287        strncpy( nfs_clientid.client_r_addr, arg_SETCLIENTID4.callback.cb_location.r_addr, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00288        strncpy( nfs_clientid.client_r_netid, arg_SETCLIENTID4.callback.cb_location.r_netid, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00289        strncpy( nfs_clientid.incoming_verifier, arg_SETCLIENTID4.client.verifier, NFS4_VERIFIER_SIZE ) ;
00290        snprintf( nfs_clientid.verifier, NFS4_VERIFIER_SIZE, "%u", (unsigned int)ServerBootTime ) ;
00291        nfs_clientid.confirmed  = UNCONFIRMED_CLIENT_ID ;
00292        nfs_clientid.cb_program = arg_SETCLIENTID4.callback.cb_program ;
00293        nfs_clientid.clientid   = clientid ;
00294        nfs_clientid.last_renew = 0 ;
00295        nfs_clientid.client_inst_num = 0 ;
00296        nfs_clientid.credential = data->credential ;
00297  
00298        if( nfs_client_id_add( clientid, nfs_clientid, pworker->clientid_pool ) != CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS )
00299          {
00300              res_SETCLIENTID4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00301              return res_SETCLIENTID4.status  ;
00302          }
00303     }
00304 
00305   res_SETCLIENTID4.SETCLIENTID4res_u.resok4.clientid = clientid ; 
00306   memset( res_SETCLIENTID4.SETCLIENTID4res_u.resok4.setclientid_confirm, 0, NFS4_VERIFIER_SIZE ) ;
00307   snprintf( res_SETCLIENTID4.SETCLIENTID4res_u.resok4.setclientid_confirm, NFS4_VERIFIER_SIZE, "%u", (unsigned int)ServerBootTime ) ; 
00308 
00309   DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID reply :ClientId=%llx Verifier=%s",  
00310                    res_SETCLIENTID4.SETCLIENTID4res_u.resok4.clientid , res_SETCLIENTID4.SETCLIENTID4res_u.resok4.setclientid_confirm ) ; 
00311  
00312   res_SETCLIENTID4.status = NFS4_OK ; 
00313   return res_SETCLIENTID4.status ;
00314 } /* nfs4_op_setclientid */
00315

00328 void nfs4_op_setclientid_Free( SETCLIENTID4res * resp )
00329 {
00330   /* Nothing to be done */
00331   return ;
00332 } /* nfs4_op_setclientid_Free */
